page.title: 12OLDEST INHABITANT
page.content: An old lady lives up Scottlethorpe all by herself.Her house is not a bungalow.It is a two storey house.The rooms are quite small and she does'nt have electricity.She uses coke and wood to light her fire.She puts her kettle and food on a kind of grill and it cooks.She has got a garden with grass and apple trees in it.She grows pumpkins and our goat used to eat the grass in her garden because she did not have a lawnmower.She has got a fence and a gate and a small shed.She has got a lot of brass objects and a copper kettle.Sometimes the owner of the shop next to the post-office delivers ice-cream and things like that down to her when she has run out of them.Perhaps they deliver paraffin to her aswell so that she can light her oil-lamp.We believe that she is 87 years old.
